verses.name: 1 Samuel 20:10
verses.text: Then said David to Jonathan, Who shall tell me? or what if thy father answer thee roughly?

verses.name: 1 Samuel 20:11
verses.text: And Jonathan said unto David, Come, and let us go out into the field. And they went out both of them into the field.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 20:12
verses.text: And Jonathan said unto David, O Lord God of Israel, when I have sounded my father about to morrow any time, or the third day, and, behold, if there be good toward David, and I then send not unto thee, and shew it thee;
